note.p: Swiss beekeeper and author. From 1879, edited and financed the Bulletin d’apiculture pour la Suisse romande, which became the Revue internationale d’apiculture, 1885–1903. Published many books on beekeeping, including La conduite du rucher (1888). Taught at the Vaud school of apiculture.
Apisite: site d’informations sur les abeilles et l’apiculture, http://apisite.online.fr/edouard.htm (accessed 5 July 2019)
